title: YouWorkForThem
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003756/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003756/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : YouWorkForThem**

Founded in 2001 by [Mike Cina](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003756/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mike%20Cina) and [Mike Young](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003756/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Mike%20Young), [YouWorkForThem](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003756/http:/youworkforthem.com/) is a virtual store that brings you typefaces as well as many other essential, creative, influential, important design products.
author: James Grieshaber
